title: What are Joseph Seifert’s critiques of Amoris Laetita? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here is my summary understanding: it deals with doctor assisted suicide. Seifert lost his job over the critique. Here is an interview: Interview: Josef Seifert on his Dismissal, Amoris Laetitia, & The Fight For an Authentic Catholic Life Ethic - OnePeterFive
